means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 登曼地貌名称，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“河谷+人”(valley+man)

PerfectNetExp.abs: denli 登利, denman 登曼, denlutible 可咽下的

auth_sentence.content: How good would it be if they could become Bridgy's Kauto and Denman?

auth_sentence.content: They are stabled next to each other, just like Kauto Star and Denman were at Paul Nicholls'.

auth_sentence.content: Denman looks a National horse through and through and I'd be very surprised if he doesn't take in next year's race.
